TitlePage.Title: &LessGenerators;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Find smaller generating sets for modules
TitlePage.TitleComment:
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. The latest version is available online at:
http://homalg.math.rwth-aachen.de/~barakat/homalg-project/LessGenerators/chap0.html
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
